import React from'react';import universal from'react-universal-component';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const withProps=(Component,props)=>{return function(matchProps){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Component,{...props,...matchProps});};};const ErrorMessage=()=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:"Error loading chunks!"});};const ComponentBlockSkeleton=props=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"loading-skeleton loading-skeleton__block",style:{height:props.skeletonHeight?props.skeletonHeight:'50px'}});const FallbackComponent=withProps(ComponentBlockSkeleton,{skeletonHeight:1000});export const withAsyncImport=function(asyncImport){let loadingComponent=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:FallbackComponent;return universal(asyncImport,{loading:loadingComponent,error:ErrorMessage});};export default withAsyncImport;
